nodes.text: Draci was an individual who lived on Tatooine during the time Galactic Civil War. Sometime following the Battle of Yavin in 0 BBY, Draci served as a guard for the Darklighter cache.

Sometime following the Battle of Yavin, Draci served as the guard for the Darklighter family's cache on Tatooine. The cache was a cave used as a storage area, close to the Darklighter estate. In anticipation of supply shortages due to the Galactic Civil War, the Darklighter's relied on the cache to help get themselves through hard times.

However, circa 1 ABY, a criminal gang known as the Desert Demons blew their way into the cache, and Draci was powerless to stop them. To root out the criminals, Draci entrusted spacers with securing the cache. Draci estimated that the spacers had only about fifteen minutes to eliminate the criminals before everything of value was looted. The spacers who were looking for a cargo smuggled from Tansarii Point Station assaulted the cave. They eliminated many Desert Demons and accessed the inventory terminals they were looking for.

Draci was a non-player character in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011. Draci was added to the game as part of the "Legacy Quest" with the release of the "Publish 25", a.k.a. the "New Game Enhancements", on November 15, 2005. In the game, Draci's species, gender, and appearance would fluctuate after each server reset.
